edu.ucsd.ccdb.ontomorph2.core.spatial
Class CoordinateSystem

java.lang.Object
  TransformMatrix
      edu.ucsd.ccdb.ontomorph2.core.spatial.CoordinateSystem
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICoordinateSystem
Direct Known Subclasses:
AllenCoordinateSystem, DemoCoordinateSystem
public abstract class CoordinateSystem
extends TransformMatrix
implements ICoordinateSystem

Defines a coordinate system with an origin, rotation, and scale. A scene object can be associated with a coordinate system, and this determines how its relative position, rotation, and scale will be transformed into its absolute position, rotation, and scale.

Author:
Stephen D. Larson (slarson@ncmir.ucsd.edu)
